2d-color-picker.name: 2D color picker
2d-color-picker.description: Replaces saturation and brightness sliders in the costume editor with a 2D color picker. Hold Shift while dragging the cursor to change the values on a single axis.

60fps.name: 60FPS project player mode
60fps.description: Alt+Click the green flag to toggle 60FPS.

animated-thumb.name: Thumbnails setter
animated-thumb.description: Adds a button to the bottom-right of the project page to set the thumbnail of your project to any image (including gifs).

better-emojis.name: Better emojis
better-emojis.description: Replaces the emojis in comments on the website with improved vector designs.

better-img-uploads.name: HD image uploads
better-img-uploads.description: Adds a new button above the "upload costume" button that automatically converts uploaded bitmap images into SVG (vector) images to avoid losing quality.

better-featured-project.name: Profile page banner
better-featured-project.description: Turns the featured project on any user's profile into a nice-looking banner.

better-quoter.name: Better forum quoter
better-quoter.description: Select text in a forum post and click quote in the bottom right corner to only quote the select text.

bitmap-copy.name: Bitmap images copying
bitmap-copy.description: Allows you to copy a bitmap image from the costume editor into the system clipboard, so that you can paste it in other websites or software.

block-cherry-picking.name: Grab single block with Ctrl key
block-cherry-picking.description: Adds the ability to drag a single block out of the middle of a script (instead of the entire stack attached below it) while holding the Ctrl key.

block-count.name: Block count
block-count.description: Shows the total number of blocks in a project in the editor menu bar. Previously part of "sprite and script count".

block-duplicate.name: Duplicate script with Alt key
block-duplicate.description: Quickly duplicate a script by dragging it while holding the Alt key. Hold Ctrl as well to only duplicate a single block instead of the entire stack attached below it.

block-palette-icons.name: Block palette category icons
block-palette-icons.description: Adds icons inside the colored circles that identify block categories.

block-switching.name: Block switching
block-switching.description: Right click on a block to switch it to a related block.

blocks2image.name: Save blocks as image
blocks2image.description: Right click the code area to export blocks as SVG/PNG images.

cat-blocks.name: Cat blocks
cat-blocks.description: Brings back editor cat hat blocks from April Fools 2020.

clones.name: Clone counter
clones.description: Adds a counter above the stage in the editor which shows the total amount of clones.

debugger.name: Debugger
debugger.description: Adds a new "debugger" block category and a "logs" window to the editor. The "log", "warn" and "error" blocks will print the specified message into the logs window. The "breakpoint" block will pause the project when executed.

editor-devtools.name: Developer tools
editor-devtools.description: Adds a find box and new menu options to the editor: copy/paste blocks, better clean up, go to custom block definition, and more!
